website_summaries.verdict: Boasting a heavy-duty construction, a reliable non-stick coating, and a generous capacity, this option is ideal for everyday bakers.
pros: High-quality cold-rolled steel construction is exceptionally sturdy and stands up well to regular use
Durable non-stick coating allows baked goods to slide out easily and makes washing up a breeze
Large 12 cavity size is ideal for baking in bulk
cons: Despite being dishwasher safe, the non-stick coating will benefit from gentle hand washing

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for egg sandwiches
customer_reviews.text: I bought this pan to cook eggs in for sandwiches. Regular muffin tins cook the egg too thick so it doesn’t reheat well. This pan cooks the egg to the perfect thickness.
customer_reviews.author: faith

customer_reviews.title: Low Carb? Baked Cheese Doesn’t Stick
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for new low carb eating ... bake squares of cheese into crackers, or sprinkle shredded cheese, bake and make mini-taco “shells” using this pan! No sticking and perfect size. Makes conformity of cheese “crackers.” I recommend 2-3 (but I made 100s of cheese crackers over Thanksgiving to go with dips). Bought this one to send to my daughter who now wants a pan for her apartment.
customer_reviews.author: G. Rutz

customer_reviews.title: Great for breakfast bagels
customer_reviews.text: I read a few reviews that said eggs stick in this pan. Eggs can be tricky in any pan. Even though the pan is nonstick I always spray the pans for that extra help. I received the pan yesterday, made 12 eggs for my homemade breakfast bagels. 375 for 14 min -little bit too long, I'll probably do 12min next time so they are a bit soft but perfect to reheat. They still came out great and slid right out of the pan.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Only works the very first time, STICKS terribly.
customer_reviews.text: I use this only for cooking eggs for homemade egg-sausage sandwiches and it worked perfectly the first time; the eggs came out without sticking. But EVERY time after that, the eggs have stuck so badly that I lose a lot of the patty, no matter if I grease/oil/butter/spray the pan. It's really frustrating and I will probably stop using this pan. I have only one greasing method left to try, and if that fails, then bye-bye pan. Very disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: Miranda

customer_reviews.title: Not non stick
customer_reviews.text: The first couple times using this pan were great the eggs just came right out. Now I have to scrub forever to get the baked on glue substance removed. I have tried butter, canola oil and the eggs still stick. Ugh I don’t recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Blank Z

customer_reviews.title: Low-carb bakers, rejoice!
customer_reviews.text: I bought the muffin top "tops" pan in order to make low-carb/keto diet friendly buns, and it's perfect! Seriously non-stick and easy clean-up. Using coconut flour or almond flour recipes online, it's by far the easiest way to inexpensively make low-carb hamburger and sandwich buns. I recommend it for anyone who's on keto or similar diets.
customer_reviews.author: Skiptholio

customer_reviews.title: Love this pan
customer_reviews.text: Love this pan! I make 12 breakfast sandwiches at a time and then freeze them. Eggs cooked in here are the perfect size for an English muffin. Spray liberally with nonstick spray. (Eggs stick!) I lightly scramble them individually and then bake them in a convection oven for 12 minutes at 300, turned halfway through. That way they are a little underdone but finish cooking when I microwave them. It's very convenient. Breakfast is ready in 1 minute.
customer_reviews.author: Angel Pie

customer_reviews.title: Egg-xactly what I needed
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely love this for making egg patties for breakfast sammies. I noticed it's a lot easier to clean when I crack an egg into each one rather than scrambled. I use margarine or butter to grease the pan first of course. I do them like 5 minutes give or take at 350, depends on what I put in the eggs. Perfect size for an English muffin, and excellent for doing meal prep as i can do 12 eggs at a time, then great breakfast that microwaves quickly. Who has the time to make healthy food everyday, certainly not me. I'm sure you could make other stuff with this pan as well.
customer_reviews.author: Jess

customer_reviews.title: Love these cupcake tins with the lids!
customer_reviews.text: Bought these specifically to make and bring over to my friends house for her sons 2nd birthday. The lids were very helpful. I made my husband hold them to be cautious of sliding/make sure the kids didn’t come off because I didn’t want to risk putting them in the trunk and having a disaster. There’s a good amount of room between the cupcakes and the lids so that’s good. I think there’s roughly 3 inches of space between them if that helps anyone.
customer_reviews.author: JBMTop Contributor: Baby

customer_reviews.title: Excellent Winton Quality; Perfect Size Muffins
customer_reviews.text: Exactly what I was looking for! Makes perfect sized almond flour biscuits (a serving is 2 of these minis, but sometimes I just want one) when the 6-well size is just a bit too much. Cleans easily with soap and hot water. I use a little nonstick spay even in my nonstick pans--stuff sticks when you least expect it to!--and the finished product slides right out onto the cooling rack. I wish I'd gotten one of these pans months ago. I love it!
customer_reviews.author: WynterFire11

customer_reviews.title: Really Good!
customer_reviews.text: Sooo Grandbaby loves blueberry muffin tops. This pan is perfect-after i figured out the amount of time needed to bake. It would have been much easier/nicer to have the time as part of the instructions! Great to just pop into the dishwasher after use.
customer_reviews.author: Babs

customer_reviews.title: The Best Part
customer_reviews.text: Let’s face it — the top of the muffin is the best part! That lovely dome, the tasty crust that forms around the edge — that’s what we bake for. Not to mention avoiding half the calories by not having a bottom. I love this pan, works great, tops pop right out, very easy to clean.
customer_reviews.author: Gracie Dea

customer_reviews.title: really liked the shallow size
customer_reviews.text: Really like it! Used it once with a small cheap bag of poppy seed muffin mix. Added a few fresh blueberries. I put one spray of oil in each and spread it around with my finger and they came right out with no sticking. Filled 10 of the 12 spaces. Baked them little too long. Only needed about 10 minutes. Pan washed up really well. Next time I will try Jiffy Corn Bread.
customer_reviews.author: Ms Minnesota

customer_reviews.title: Keto Friendly!
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this items because of a recipe for Keto Biscuits that I've found. This product is non stick and I don't need to add extra oils for the biscuits to release. Wilton products have always impressed me. They are well made, sturdy and last a very long time. I have not noticed and peeling of the coating. Although, I do not use any metal utensils with the product. Wilton is and awesome brand and I highly recommend them!!
customer_reviews.author: Natasha B. Benton

customer_reviews.title: The correct Pan measurement is 16 1/2" (includes the handles) by 11 3/4"
customer_reviews.text: I bought this pan to make neat, round cookies, in my toaster oven. The pan is not 16" by 11". The pan is 16 1/2" (includes the handles) by 11 3/4". I didn't find this out until I already had the cookie dough in the pan, so I had to use my electric roasting oven to bake them, instead of heating up a huge oven for one batch of cookies.
customer_reviews.author: Sequoia

customer_reviews.title: Great for breakfast sandwiches
customer_reviews.text: Bought this to make egg patties for a quick and easy breakfast. Works great! If you plan to do the same, just make sure you spray with cooking spray first - one time I forgot and ended up having to really clean it, but otherwise the little patties pop right out and are perfect in English muffin breakfast sandwiches.
customer_reviews.author: Zsa415

customer_reviews.title: Stay away, nonstick is a joke
customer_reviews.text: I used this pan to bake a batch of eggs instead of hard boiling them. All I have to say is stay away from this pan if your looking for a nonstick pan. I was scrubbing and scrubbing each time trying to get off the residue and the eggs always had to be removed with a silicone spatula breaking the nicely formed eggs. Stay away, just thru mine out and looking for another.
customer_reviews.author: Vipercom

customer_reviews.title: Works Great
customer_reviews.text: This was purchased for my daughter. She had found a cookie pan at the Salvation Army store and really liked it. SHe was unable to find it so we looked for something close. The Muffin Top Pan does a great job of making perfectly shaped and sized cookies. Haven't tried it for muffin tops uyet.
customer_reviews.author: PJ Miami

customer_reviews.title: This works great
customer_reviews.text: I always made regular muffins until my fiancee told me about the muffin top pans, these are great. This one cooks evenly, is so easy to clean and is super non stick.
customer_reviews.author: Krystal Clifton

customer_reviews.title: Top Quality. A Must Have Bakers!
customer_reviews.text: Top Quality from a name that deserves much more recognition. My parents use to buy Wilton decades ago because of the quality of the pieces. It hasn't changed decades later. You want top quality, buy Wilton! These muffin top trays work grest! Buy them. If my review helped you, please click HELPFUL. Thank you
customer_reviews.author: Executive Director of WindowsHD

customer_reviews.title: Muffin Tops are
customer_reviews.text: very good. The size of each muffin is the same as a standard size muffin, they're just spread out wider. An 11.5 oz packaged Krusteaz muffin mix is perfect, 12 muffins in either pan. I like the muffin top pan for the crispier tops that somehow taste better. I do bake them about 2 minutes longer than the box states for regular muffin tins.
customer_reviews.author: Fast Eddie Autrey

customer_reviews.title: Easy to clean, non stick
customer_reviews.text: Love this pan so far! I’ve made egg patties, muffins, biscuits and even cookies on it . Unlike other reviews I haven’t had any issues with things sticking what so ever . I use PAM spray or coconut oil to grease before each use and then gently clean with warm soapy water and a cloth towel as to not scratch the non stick material. Still looks like new !
customer_reviews.author: Lauren fortier

customer_reviews.title: A very versitile pan
customer_reviews.text: This pan has a whole lot of uses ... muffin tops, cookies, candies, eggs etc. It's sturdy, non stick and exactly as described. I use it far more than I thought I would. Another good feature is that it is no thicker than a cookie sheet and can easily be stored. It cleans easily in the dishwasher.
customer_reviews.author: TM Ohio

customer_reviews.title: Great for making flour-free buns
customer_reviews.text: We purchased this pan to make low-carb almond buns and it works perfectly for that purpose. The nonstick surface is just as good as your standard, and the pan itself isn't much larger than a typical muffin pan, though it is wider. The "muffin top" sections themselves are just a bit larger than a typical burger bun. If you have any questions just let me know!
customer_reviews.author: EugeneLouise

customer_reviews.title: Best muffin pan ~ a must for your kitchen!
customer_reviews.text: I received this pan today and made my first batch of corn muffin tops. I LOVE this pan! I will NEVER make muffins in my other pans again. I was surprised that each circle holds the batter of a regular size muffin pan. The muffins came right out of the pan without the non-stick spray. If you like to bake, you will love this pan. My daughters want to use the pan to make cookies next.
customer_reviews.author: Busy mom

customer_reviews.title: High quality, works reliably, easy to clean
customer_reviews.text: Top quality product. My wife's an accomplished baker, and she specified the brand. No reservations in recommending it.
customer_reviews.author: Fledermaus

customer_reviews.title: We make a few dozen at a time then freeze them for easy grab and go breakfast sandwiches
customer_reviews.text: We use these to make little mini egg circles to be put into egg, ham and cheese muffins for breakfast. We make a few dozen at a time then freeze them for easy grab and go breakfast sandwiches. The pan itself is great and so far we have never had anything stick to this at all. Five Start Product all the way
customer_reviews.author: BBarich

customer_reviews.title: Exactly what I was looking for!
customer_reviews.text: I've been looking for the perfect pan to precook egg patties to freeze and keep at work. This is perfect size for the eggs to fit on an english muffin! Now I can get my protein after one minute in the microwave, instead of eating pastries.
customer_reviews.author: M. Fazzio

customer_reviews.title: Not as advertised
customer_reviews.text: This pan promises to be non stick. Even with oil I had a hard time getting my corn muffins out. It only comes out clean if you use muffin/cupcake liners which don't fit. I wouldn't recommend this to anyone.
customer_reviews.author: elaine denton

customer_reviews.title: Who wants a McMuffin?
customer_reviews.text: Exactly what I needed. I like to make breakfast sandwiches in the morning and needed to meal prep a lot of eggs. These came out the same size as the McDonald’s McMuffin but way healthier. I used Pam because of habit for it to not stick, idk if I would ever put eggs in something without a little oil. But these bad boys came right out. Love it!
customer_reviews.author: Seattlelover23

customer_reviews.title: Isn't "Non-Stick" as Advertised
customer_reviews.text: Pros: Great size for making muffin tops and egg sliders. Heats evenly in an electric oven. Cons: Is difficult to clean. A "non-stick" pan should be easy to clean with dish soap and warm water, just like other Wilton non-stick pans. This one takes extra effort to clean, even after using non-stick cooking spray in the cavities prior to baking the item.
customer_reviews.author: Boo-Yah AmazonPrime

customer_reviews.title: The best muffin tin
customer_reviews.text: For 20 years I've thought I just sucked at muffins - then I decided to finally let go of my grocery store ECKO tins I've had since college and researched this product as the best thing going. Those reviews are correct - the heavy gauge metal heats better, the design is easier to clean, and the finish is much more durable. The end result is my muffins actually rise now, the sides aren't too brown while the middles won't set, and the texture is much lighter. All this time I thought the equipment couldn't make that much difference - man was I wrong - I should have bought this product a decade ago.
customer_reviews.author: William H. Johnson

customer_reviews.title: Item received was not as advertised. the muffin tin ...
customer_reviews.text: Item received was not as advertised. the muffin tin I received was not a Wilton Avanti. Instead I was sent a "World market" muffin tin. I already own a Wilton muffin tin and the one I received was completely different and of much lesser quality. The pan I was sent was something you would find in a .99 cent store. Not sure why it was advertised as a Wilton and I am aware that this pan has been discontinued. However the product is listed as the Wilton Avanti and the picture provided represents the pan I was hoping to buy. Not sure why I received something completely different.
customer_reviews.author: Erik N

customer_reviews.title: Works perfectly for me!
customer_reviews.text: This is perfect for the double chocolate muffins that I make. Only the tops of the muffins would get eaten when I used to make them in a regular muffin pan so this suits my purpose perfectly. I do still spray the pan with non-stick cooking spray so I can't vouch for whether or not it sticks without it but it works great for me!
customer_reviews.author: KAM

customer_reviews.title: You don't need muffin pans anymore
customer_reviews.text: Love these for making cookies and muffins! I'm going from try for eggs too for homeade quiche! They clean up real easy and leave a yum crisp edge on the bottom
customer_reviews.author: Dr. Trav

customer_reviews.title: No Non-Stick Spay Needed
customer_reviews.text: My fiance purchased this pan specifically for pre-made mini-quiches. The first batch she cooked, she decided to use non-stick spray, just in case the egg mixture stuck to the pan. The first batch almost jumped out of the pan as she moved it from the oven to the counter-top. She decided not to use the spray for the second batch and the mini-quiches slid right out the pan. The mini-quiches fit an English Muffin perfectly without being too thick. Her next task, apparently, is to make this a multi-use pan. I'm hoping for cookies.
customer_reviews.author: Marcus Schroeder

customer_reviews.title: Not Non Stick
customer_reviews.text: Not non stick at all. Washed it once and muffins stuck to the pan afterwards. Don’t recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Caren

customer_reviews.title: Amazing lidded pan
customer_reviews.text: Love this lidded muffin pan. Super non-stick made brownies without wrapper in these just flipped the pan over amazing! The lid makes for easy transportation and storage of your baked goods. Super happy with this purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Margaret

customer_reviews.title: Great
customer_reviews.text: These are the perfect size for a snack. They make a good hold you over til dinner. It bakes well with so many snacks, muffin, cupcake, breads, even cookies to mention a few.
customer_reviews.author: cvgranny

customer_reviews.title: If you like muffin tips, get this!
customer_reviews.text: LOVE it! Muffin tops are always my favorite (even if they go right to my muffin top lol). They came out uniform and perfect on multiple occasions.
customer_reviews.author: RavynT

customer_reviews.title: Very nice product
customer_reviews.text: It's just lovely and works great. I can make muffin top items as well as flatter bun-like breads (including gluten-free). It's just perfect for making tea time cakes.
customer_reviews.author: Allison Dey

customer_reviews.title: gifted to my sister
customer_reviews.text: This was gifted to my sister and she said that it was ok but that she wished it was easier to clean. Based on her review, I am giving 3 stars.
customer_reviews.author: nalokaloka

customer_reviews.title: Great nonstick pan.
customer_reviews.text: Great pan from a great company. Does it’s job fabulously. The size of indents were a bit smaller than I had hoped but that’s on me. I got it to make keto buns on but they came out so small. Guess I have a keto slider pan now. 😊
customer_reviews.author: V. Blanchard

customer_reviews.title: No Kidding Non-Stick
customer_reviews.text: My 30-year-old muffin pans had rusted. Since I live in the tropics where everything rusts, I thought I'd try silicone. That was a disaster. Ugly, misshapen muffins that were tough to remove and left a residue that had to be soaked off. Next, I ordered these Wilton pans, based on others' reviews. My banana nut muffins tumbled right out of the cups and clean-up was a breeze. These are oversize, HEAVY pans, but the result is beautiful evenly baked muffins. I couldn't be happier.
customer_reviews.author: Home Hunter 808

customer_reviews.title: Great quality pan.
customer_reviews.text: This is a great pan for mini pancakes. They will come out with a different texture by baking. But it saves so much time. Great pan for cookies too I imagine. Would purchase again.
customer_reviews.author: Dawn

customer_reviews.title: Makes perfect whoopie pies!
customer_reviews.text: Love this pan! Made perfect and uniform sized whoopie pie cakes! I used a little under a 1/4 cup batter for each one. Easy pleasy clean up too I sprayed a little cooking spray in each cup first
customer_reviews.author: Steve C.

customer_reviews.title: Great pans!
customer_reviews.text: I use them for baking cookies. I like a consistent size and thickness. These pans work well for that. I do have to reduce the temperature to keep the bottoms from over baking.
customer_reviews.author: John Doe

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for eggs.
customer_reviews.text: Bought this to make eggs for sandwiches. Perfect. Mix them up, bake and freeze for use later. Had an abundance of eggs. Easy prep for early morning breakfasts.
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer L. Klemetson

customer_reviews.title: They all baked nicely. I had no sticking issues
customer_reviews.text: I've made muffin tops, egg muffins, and pancakes in this so far. They all baked nicely. I had no sticking issues. I originally purchased this item to make gluten free cookies in it for my nephews birthday. I haven't done that yet, as his BD isn't until April.
customer_reviews.author: Clarissia Bent

customer_reviews.title: Great for making Gluten-Free Buns
customer_reviews.text: I bought this muffin top pan to make gluten-free buns and it worked great!! I didn't even have to grease the bottom of the pan, buns slide off easily after baking. I want to get another one of these so I can bake a bigger batch!
customer_reviews.author: DEB

customer_reviews.title: Easy to clean
customer_reviews.text: Great pan for meal planning. I use it for eggs. Cook at about 400° for about 8-12 minutes, depending on how soft you want the eggs. So easy and great for planning ahead breakfast sandwiches. Just be sure to spritz the pan with oil first and cleaning is a breeze.
customer_reviews.author: D. Warden

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: This baker is pleased with the product. I have made whoopie pies and they came out perfect. Product came quickly and in good condition. A happy baker! Would purchase again.
customer_reviews.author: teresa davila

customer_reviews.title: Ultimately disappointed
customer_reviews.text: After a few uses, despite greasing everything started to stick. It also became progressively more and more difficult to clean.
customer_reviews.author: M. Medina

customer_reviews.title: Great Whoppie Pie make
customer_reviews.text: Bought this mainly to make Whoppie Pies and it worked great. The 'cookie' was a little thicker than preferred but that can easily be adjusted.
customer_reviews.author: Paul Doucette

customer_reviews.title: Only muffin tops
customer_reviews.text: It's perfect. Even the jiffy muffins are good but they usually make 6 muffins per box. On this pan it makes 8-10 muffin tops
customer_reviews.author: Corinne

customer_reviews.title: Use this pan almost weekly
customer_reviews.text: I use this pan to make not only a batch of muffin tops for the week (much better than a vita top - and cheaper!) and also a type of "mini omelete" to put on top of engligh muffins during the week. I make a batch of egg beaters, onion, peppers, ham, and cheese and bake in the oven for 10-15 mins and my family just adds to an english muffin and now they have a warm breakfast sandwich during the week
customer_reviews.author: ShannonInGH

customer_reviews.title: I use this pan for making eggs for breakfast sandwiches ...
customer_reviews.text: I use this pan for making eggs for breakfast sandwiches; the size fits an english muffin perfectly. Wilton products, when care for properly, last for many years for the price you pay for them.
customer_reviews.author: CShaw

customer_reviews.title: Wilton cookie pan
customer_reviews.text: The slots are a bit smaller than I thought, but it’s a good product and my cakes came out perfect .
customer_reviews.author: Stargirl

customer_reviews.title: I really like the muffin pan and the muffin crowns
customer_reviews.text: I really like the muffin pan and the muffin crowns, rather than whole muffins, that are baked in this pan. I gave my old one to my daughter. I am glad I was able to find one online for myself to buy because for years I didn't, and still don't see, any such pan in stores.
customer_reviews.author: Nanny granny

customer_reviews.title: Eggs made easy
customer_reviews.text: Great to cook eggs. A dozen eggs at 350 for 15 minutes = 12 breakfast sandwiches.
customer_reviews.author: Shimz

customer_reviews.title: Nice
customer_reviews.text: I like mine. I have made muffin tops (of course), cornbread and eggs in it so far. Everything came out great.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Would look for another item.
customer_reviews.text: If I could give it zero stars I would! It's not nonstick and the coating came off on the first wash.
customer_reviews.author: dan somers

customer_reviews.title: Perfect pan
customer_reviews.text: This is pretty much the perfect pan! Very easy to clean, and it has a no stick surface
customer_reviews.author: Savannah

customer_reviews.title: Not an option for eggs
customer_reviews.text: Was disappointed that egg mc muffin style eggs could not be achieved. Tried cracking egg and bursting yolk in the cavity as well as scrambled. All efforts were attempted with and without cooking oil sprayed in cavity. Eggs stuck to the non- stick coating. All were oven baked at 350 degrees. Hoped I could prepare multiple eggs simultaneously for use in sandwiches. No such luck!
customer_reviews.author: Gary F.

customer_reviews.title: Great buy!
customer_reviews.text: This whoppie pie pan worked perfectly during the holidays!! I would definitely purchase another.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great buy
customer_reviews.text: Perfect egg pan and use to make perfect egg sandwiches. And it is non stick
customer_reviews.author: Juicy K

customer_reviews.title: Not impressed
customer_reviews.text: First, my pan arrived not laying flat, I can only compare it to my old warped ones. I REALLY wanted these to work but in the end they just didn't
customer_reviews.author: Alyse & Jeff

customer_reviews.title: Must have!
customer_reviews.text: I love this pan! I really like just the tops of muffins so its perfect for that. Its also great for making mini cheese taco shells!
customer_reviews.author: Amy D Frazier

customer_reviews.title: Great pan
customer_reviews.text: These pans are great. We are on a Keto eating plan and use these pans to make the perfect cheese chips. No stick, no mess and wasy to clean.
customer_reviews.author: JOe

customer_reviews.title: Versatile and well made!
customer_reviews.text: I liked everything about this baking pan! Even heat dristribution, no stick, and easy to clean!
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: One Star
customer_reviews.text: If you are purchasing this for hamburger buns don't waste the money. Very disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: Brenda R. Williams

customer_reviews.title: Great for Eggs!
customer_reviews.text: Use this for baking eggs and prepping egg mcmuffins for the week. Excellent, and easy to clean. Have used it 3 times and holding up well....
customer_reviews.author: Meg

customer_reviews.title: Grand kids made me do it.
customer_reviews.text: My grand kids would eat the tops off all my home made muffins. This changed all that because that's all they get now.
customer_reviews.author: toyfarm

customer_reviews.title: Love it.
customer_reviews.text: Love love love this. Love making cornbread in it. So easy to clean
customer_reviews.author: Kat

customer_reviews.title: Great for cooking eggs
customer_reviews.text: This pan is wonderful when making egg Mc muffins for breakfast.
customer_reviews.author: Copboots

customer_reviews.title: Great product!
customer_reviews.text: Love this pan! My muffins turned out perfectly on the first use and did not stick at all. Highly recommend
customer_reviews.author: Madeline

customer_reviews.title: Great for corn muffins.
customer_reviews.text: You would not believe how good corn muffin mix works in this thing. Just remember to fill all 12 with a standard mix, not 6.
customer_reviews.author: Benjamin D

customer_reviews.title: Perfect
customer_reviews.text: I use it to make eggs for breakfast sandwiches and it's perfect!!!
customer_reviews.author: Amber Greenough

customer_reviews.title: Love this n es
customer_reviews.text: Nice muffin pan Easy clean up Use ice cream scoop for fill in
customer_reviews.author: Elisapeta Haley

customer_reviews.title: This pan works GREAT. Had a Pioneer Woman muffin top recipe I ...
customer_reviews.text: This pan works GREAT. Had a Pioneer Woman muffin top recipe I wanted to try. Had no idea such a pan existed. Absolutely PERFECT.
customer_reviews.author: desertdancer

customer_reviews.title: Great for eggs
customer_reviews.text: Works great for eggs for breakfast sandwiches...make sure to oil it first.
customer_reviews.author: Jana

customer_reviews.title: LOVE this pan
customer_reviews.text: Love this pan. I am a blueberry muffin nut but really just like the top part. This pan worked great. Now I can make just muffin tops. Would definitely order again.
customer_reviews.author: Nancy C.

customer_reviews.title: Love this pan
customer_reviews.text: Love this pan. Very easy to clean. I use it to make low carb mini taco shells, they turn out almost the exact same size as deli mini tacos. I have not used this to make muffin tops.
customer_reviews.author: Jenni

customer_reviews.title: Game changer
customer_reviews.text: I haven't tested the purely non-stick properties of this yet, but a pretty minimal coating of bacon grease has worked like an absolute charm. The size of the moulds are perfect for small sandwich buns - I am so happy to have this product in my kitchen!
customer_reviews.author: C M

customer_reviews.title: You will love
customer_reviews.text: Love this pan. I make eggs in it for egg McMuffins. Perfect shape and size. I want to find more recipes for it. Love there are 12 slots too.
customer_reviews.author: S R

customer_reviews.title: Love this pan!
customer_reviews.text: I started using this pan for Keto recipes. It’s a game changer! Love this pan!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: it worked great. must have patience though
customer_reviews.text: I've only used once and there is a bit of a learning curve as to how much to fill, but once I got the hang of it, it worked great. must have patience though.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Lid doesnt stay put
customer_reviews.text: I love that I can easily cover my muffins and throw in the fridge - I do not like that the lid barely stays on. I was hoping for a sturdy reliable container.. for now, it works.
customer_reviews.author: Jtully

customer_reviews.title: Love
customer_reviews.text: Love this, but wish I could find some paper liners. It does wash very easily though.
customer_reviews.author: Whitney

customer_reviews.title: Great pan
customer_reviews.text: This pan is awesome!! I bought it to use for micro tacos (keto recipe). It was perfect. Easy to wash too. Great quality!
customer_reviews.author: Martha Carlton

customer_reviews.title: Amazing value. Nonstick for sure.
customer_reviews.text: Amazing muffin top pan! Does exactly what I needed it to do!
customer_reviews.author: Jason

customer_reviews.title: Great pan for cupcakes
customer_reviews.text: Perfect for making muffin-top cupcakes, etc. My nephews love the "less cake and more icing" that these make. I made muffins without paper and they came right out of the tin with no mess or breaking.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon.Fan

customer_reviews.title: Good product, the only issue
customer_reviews.text: Good product, the only issue, the eggs stick to the pan somewhat, even if you spray non stick spray.
customer_reviews.author: Alfiero  Colafrancesco

customer_reviews.title: Just what I've always wanted, even though I didn't know it!
customer_reviews.text: I like making (and eating!!) muffins but I often don't have the paper liners, nor do I want to laboriously grease every little cup. This pan is just the ticket. It's heavy and has a good quality nonstick surface on it. I can see many uses for this little baby - rolls, cookies, baked eggs......every baker should have one! I only wish now that I had two!
customer_reviews.author: S. Harrison

customer_reviews.title: Do not buy!!
customer_reviews.text: I agree with reviews before this was an amazing pan the first 2 times and now no matter what it sticks. I'd hate to order more from this company because I'm afraid it will all be the same
customer_reviews.author: Lisa Martinez

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: I love this product. I make brownies with it that have the perfect texture.
customer_reviews.author: Jai

customer_reviews.title: Makes great muffin tops! :)
customer_reviews.text: I like that it's easy to wash, it ships super quickly & my muffin tops turned out yummy! :)
customer_reviews.author: Carrie

customer_reviews.title: This pan is great for making eggs for breakfast sandwiches
customer_reviews.text: Bought this to try making eggs for breakfast sandwiches. It is the perfect size for an english muffin breakfast sandwich!!!
customer_reviews.author: tjcuster

customer_reviews.title: Shallow
customer_reviews.text: I thought the cavities would be a little deeper. This does not hold much batter at all. I have a Muffin Top Pan from a different manufacturer, and it is easily 2 - 3 times deeper than this one.
customer_reviews.author: Mo

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for muffin tops
customer_reviews.text: I love muffins but don't want all the calories of a full-size muffin. This pan makes the perfect size muffin top using my regular muffin recipes. Well-made and sturdy - the pan does not warp at all even at high oven temperatures. Very satisfied with this purchase.
customer_reviews.author: LindyLouTop Contributor: Cooking

product_meta.title: Wilton Perfect Results Premium Non-Stick Bakeware Muffin Top Baking Pan, Enjoy the Best Part of the Muffin, Also Great for Eggs, Corn Bread and More, 12 Cavities
product_meta.description: Style:Muffin Top PanThe best part of a muffin is the top. With this non-stick baking pan, you can now make just the best part. But you don't have to stop there, use it to cook eggs, cornbread, large drop cookies and even brownies. This multi-use baking pan will be a staple for home bakers everywhere. From cloud bread to mini taco shells this versatile pan will get a lot of use in your kitchen. 16 x 11 in. 12 cavities, cavity size: 3 in. dia. x .5 inches. Wilton helps families celebrate! We inspire the joy of creativity in everyone, everywhere, every day. Since 1929, Wilton has been helping home bakers and cake decorators all over the world create sweet treats and beautiful desserts by giving them the tools to make it fun and easy. The Wilton name is known around the world for cake decorating, candy making, bakeware and party products. At Wilton, we're passionate about bringing the love of baking and decorating to every consumer.
feature_bullets: JUST THE MUFFIN TOP PLEASE: Why make an entire muffin when you only like to eat the top? This pan lets you make just the part you like best with no waste. It’s also great for making drop cookies, brownies and more
VERSATILITY IN THE KITCHEN: This pan has been used to make hamburger buns, cheese crackers, mini taco shells, egg sandwiches, cloud bread and so much more. The possibilities are endless
NON-STICK SURFACE: Features a non-stick surface with a coating that provides a quick and clean release of your tasty treats and makes cleanup a breeze

USE AND CARE INSTRUCTIONS: This baking pan is dishwasher safe; however, for best results, hand wash in warm, soapy water before first and after each use. Rinse and dry thoroughly with a soft cloth. Each pan is covered by Wilton's Limited 10-year warranty; contact seller for further details

EVERYONE, EVERYWHERE, EVERY DAY: Innovative products. Mouthwatering inspiration. Fun in the kitchen. This has been at the heart of what we do for nearly 90 years. Whether you’re hosting a party or need to bring a special treat, Wilton has you covered
